thread.title: The Sharks of ‘Shark Tank’ dish on their biggest regrets and best deals: Interactive interview - ABC News
thread.title_full: The Sharks of ‘Shark Tank’ dish on their biggest regrets and best deals: Interactive interview - ABC News

author: Abc News
title: The Sharks of ‘Shark Tank’ dish on their biggest regrets and best deals: Interactive interview - ABC News
text: The sharks of ABC's "Shark Tank" appear during an interview for ABC News "20/20." 0 Shares Email On the ABC News app? Click HERE to watch this interactive video. ABC’s "20/20" anchors David Muir and Elizabeth Vargas sat down with the all of the Sharks, except for Lori Grenier, to celebrate ‘Shark Tank’s’ seven-and-a-half-year journey leading up to their $100 million in deals made on the show. The following is an interactive interview that you get to moderate. Anytime you want to direct the conversation navigate to the menu and select a topic from the list. Watch the special two-hour event Friday, February 24th on ABC. 0 Shares
